data.question: What is the main method of ammonia production mentioned in the text?
What combination enables the fixation of nitrogen to be catalysed by molybdenum complexes under ambient conditions?
data.answer: The combination of samarium(ii) diiodide (SmI2) with alcohols or water

data.question: What is the turnover frequency of ammonia formation mentioned for the molybdenum catalyst?
True or False: The current reaction system is suitable for use on an industrial scale.
What is the yield of ammonia based on the molybdenum atom when using ethylene glycol as a proton source?
What is the effect of using water as a proton source compared to alcohols in the reaction system?
data.answer: Water acts as a more effective proton source than alcohols

data.question: True or False: The combination of SmI2 and ethylene glycol is an effective reaction system for the formation of ammonia.
What is the turnover frequency of ammonia formation using 9 as a catalyst in reaction system B?
True or False: The amount of ammonia produced in water (4,350 equiv.) is substantially higher than that produced in ethylene glycol (3,650 equiv.).
What is the kinetic isotope effect ratio (kH/kD) for the catalytic reaction using deuterated ethylene glycol?
True or False: The formation of molybdenum oxo complexes, including 5, interferes with the formation of ammonia in reaction system B.
What is the yield of ammonia when using methanol (MeOH) as a proton source instead of ethylene glycol?
True or False: The reaction of nitrogen gas with SmI2 and ethylene glycol in the presence of 9 in THF at room temperature for 4 h gave 3,650 equiv. of ammonia.
What happens to the samarium centre in the oxygen-bridged disamarium(iii) complex (7a) during the reaction?
data.answer: The samarium centre had been oxidized from Sm(ii) to Sm(iii) together with the loss of 1 equiv. of protons

data.question: True or False: The reaction of 1a with 5 equiv. of SmI2 in THF under 1 atm of N2 gave the corresponding molybdenum nitride complex [MoI(≡N)(PNP)] (4) in 76% yield.
What is the yield of ammonia when using tert-butyl alcohol (tBuOH) as a proton source?
True or False: The reaction of a cationic molybdenum oxo complex bearing an aqua ligand with SmI2 under 1 atm of N2 gave the molybdenum nitride complex 4 in 36% yield.
What is the yield of ammonia based on the molybdenum atom when using water as a proton source in the presence of 9 as a catalyst?
True or False: The combination of SmI2 and ethylene glycol works together for ammonia formation in reaction system B.
What is the turnover frequency of ammonia formation using 1a as a catalyst in reaction system A?
